amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to support Operation Odyssey Dawn or Operation Unified Protector.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to support Operation Odyssey Dawn or Operation Unified Protector.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rigell amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 249 (Roll no. 515).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rigell amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 249 (Roll no. 515).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Rigell.
